    RETURN TO ISSUEPREVPerspectiveNEXT

    Therapeutic Utility of Cannabinoid Receptor Type 2 (CB2) Selective Agonists

    • Sangdon Han
      • , 
    • Jayant Thatte
      • , 
    • Daniel J. Buzard
      • , and 
    • Robert M. Jones*
    View Author Information
    Department of Medicinal Chemistry, Arena Pharmaceuticals, 6166 Nancy Ridge Drive, San Diego, California 92121, United States
    *Telephone: 858-453-7200, extension 1794. Fax: 858-453-7210. E-mail: [email protected]
    Cite this: J. Med. Chem. 2013, 56, 21, 8224–8256
    Publication Date (Web):July 18, 2013

    Publication History

    • Received17 April 2013
    • Published online8 August 2013
    • Published inissue 14 November 2013
    https://doi.org/10.1021/jm4005626
    Copyright © 2013 American Chemical Society

    SUBJECTS:
